kv4.6:5.3: Bodhiyā niruddhāya vigatāya paṭipassaddhāya abuddho hotīti?
kv4.6:7.3: Tāya bodhiyā dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv4.6:11.1: Paccuppannāya bodhiyā buddho, tāya bodhiyā bodhikaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv4.6:11.3: Atītāya bodhiyā buddho, tāya bodhiyā bodhikaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv4.6:12.1: Paccuppannāya bodhiyā buddho, tāya bodhiyā dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv4.6:12.3: Atītāya bodhiyā buddho, tāya bodhiyā dukkhaṃ parijānāti … pe …
kv4.6:13.1: Paccuppannāya bodhiyā buddho, tāya bodhiyā bodhikaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv4.6:13.3: Anāgatāya bodhiyā buddho, tāya bodhiyā bodhikaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv4.6:14.1: Paccuppannāya bodhiyā buddho, tāya bodhiyā dukkhaṃ parijānāti … pe …
kv4.6:14.5: Anāgatāya bodhiyā buddho, tāya bodhiyā dukkhaṃ parijānāti … pe …
kv4.6:15.1: Atītāya bodhiyā buddho, na ca tāya bodhiyā bodhikaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv4.6:15.3: Paccuppannāya bodhiyā buddho, na ca tāya bodhiyā bodhikaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv4.6:16.1: Atītāya bodhiyā buddho, na ca tāya bodhiyā dukkhaṃ parijānāti … pe …
kv4.6:16.5: Paccuppannāya bodhiyā buddho, na ca tāya bodhiyā dukkhaṃ parijānāti … pe …
kv4.6:17.1: Anāgatāya bodhiyā buddho, na ca tāya bodhiyā bodhikaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv4.6:17.3: Paccuppannāya bodhiyā buddho, na ca tāya bodhiyā bodhikaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv4.6:18.1: Anāgatāya bodhiyā buddho, na ca tāya bodhiyā dukkhaṃ parijānāti … pe …
kv4.6:18.5: Paccuppannāya bodhiyā buddho, na ca tāya bodhiyā dukkhaṃ parijānāti … pe …
kv4.6:19.1: Atītāya bodhiyā buddho, anāgatāya bodhiyā buddho, paccuppannāya bodhiyā buddhoti?
kv4.6:20.3: Satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ tīhi bodhīhi samannāgato samohito, tisso bodhiyo paccupaṭṭhitāti?
kv4.6:21.6: Hañci bodhipaṭilābhā buddho, tena vata re vattabbe—
